description.et: Iseseisev töö õppejõuga eelnevalt kokkulepitud teemal.

objectives.en: A student can do research on an individual topic in cryptography or computer security.
objectives.et: Üliõpilasel on võimalus teha täiendavat iseseisvat uurimistööd  krüptograafia- või andmeturbealasel teemal.

learning_outcomes.en: Students get aquinted with cryptographic literature and enhances their  abilities in scientific writing.
learning_outcomes.et: Üliõpilane saab esmase kogemuse krüptograafiliste allikmaterjalidega töötamisel ning arendab nende oskusi saadud tulemuste korrektsel vormistamisel ja esitlemisel.

independent_work.et: The instructions are given by lecutrer for every research project

description.et: The research project is performed under supervision, and evaluated by the staff of the information security and cryptology research group in Tartu University.

grade_evaluation.et: The final grade is established based on the performance in the assigned project, written report, class presentation and participation in the meetings.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

resources.mandatory_materials: The reading material is given by lecturer for every research project separately
